name: why-google-wants-to-break-adblock
metaDescription: Google plans to remove support for an API which gives extensions such as Adblock and uBlock Origin full-control over which content is loaded in your browser. Here's why it might be a good idea.
title: Why Google Wants to Break Adblock
summary: Google plans to remove support for an API which gives extensions such as Adblock and uBlock Origin full-control over which content is loaded in your browser. Here's why it might be a good idea.
